item.title: Rappi 从桑坦德银行和私人信贷机构获得 1 亿美元贷款
item.description: 拉美最有价值的初创企业之一 Rappi 公司从桑坦德银行和 Kirkoswald Capital Partners 获得了 1 亿美元的贷款，这是这家哥伦比亚外卖初创企业十年前成立以来最大的一笔债务融资。【原文：Rappi Inc., one of Latin America’s most valuable startups, secured a $100 million loan from Banco Santander and Kirkoswald Capital Partners, marking its largest debt financing since the Colombian delivery startup’s founding a decade ago.】

item.title: Propirm Prime Trading 进入芝加哥 S&P 500 期权市场
item.description: Prime Trading 在 Cboe 期权交易所设立了场内业务，这标志着芝加哥拥有 177 年历史的面对面衍生品交易传统正在继续吸引投资。【原文：Prime Trading has established a floor operation at Cboe Options Exchange, in a sign the 177 year-old tradition of face-to-face derivatives trading in Chicago is continuing to attract investment.】

item.title: 美国银行削减债券风险至金融危机以来最低水平
item.description: 自金融危机以来，美国各州和地方政府出售的债务中，银行持有的份额最小，尽管其估值颇具吸引力，新债券销售量也很大。【原文：US banks are holding the smallest share of debt sold by states and localities since the financial crisis despite attractive valuations and a heavy flow of new bond sales.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Perry 预计到 2030 年二级市场规模将突破 4000 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的 Verdun Perry 称买卖私人资产的现有股权是该市场 "最未得到充分利用的工具"，并预测到 2030 年二级市场的交易量将翻一番多，达到 4,000 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s Verdun Perry called buying and selling existing stakes of private assets “the most underutilized tool” in that market, predicting secondaries deal volume will more than double to $400 billion by 2030.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油产量有望保持稳定，尽管遭遇五年来最艰难时期
item.description: 据莫斯科的一位咨询师称，尽管俄罗斯石油业正经历自 "科维德-19 "大流行病以来最具挑战性的时期，但今年的石油产量和出口量仍将保持稳定。【原文：Russia’s oil output and exports will remain steady this year even as the industry goes through its most challenging period since the Covid-19 pandemic, according to a Moscow-based consultant.】

item.title: 门罗打包私人基金股权，融资 3.5 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，总部位于芝加哥的私人信贷投资者门罗资本公司（Monroe Capital）计划通过结构性融资工具融资约 3.5 亿美元，该工具以其持有的一些基金股权的现金流为支持。【原文：Chicago-based private credit investor Monroe Capital plans to raise around $350 million through a structured finance vehicle backed by cash flows from stakes in a number of its funds, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 里夫斯希望堵住财政黑洞，为何英国增税迫在眉睫？
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）即将迎来一个艰难的秋季预算，经济学家们做出了一个共同的预测：增税在即。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is heading into a difficult autumn budget as economists make a common prediction: tax rises are in store.】

item.title: 谷歌发布 Pixel 10 手机，雄心勃勃地推出新的人工智能功能
item.description:
公司在 Pixel Watch 4、新款可折叠手机和耳塞上展示了 Gemini，从而取得了人工智能的胜利。【原文：

Company takes AI victory lap by showcasing Gemini on Pixel Watch 4, new foldable, and earbuds.

item.title: 被特朗普赦免的比特币交易所（BitMEX）创始人加入黑客攻击热潮
item.description: 亚瑟-海耶斯（Arthur Hayes）发财了、被起诉了、被禁止了，所有这些都发生在他 40 岁之前。他将 BitMEX 打造成世界上最大的加密货币交易平台之一，眼睁睁地看着它在监管和法律的炮火下倒下，后来，唐纳德-特朗普总统赦免了他的罪行。【原文：Arthur Hayes got rich, indicted and banned — all before turning 40. He built BitMEX into one of the world’s largest crypto trading platforms, watched it buckle under regulatory and legal fire, and later saw his conviction wiped clean by a pardon from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 散蜘蛛成员因一系列黑客行为被判 10 年监禁
item.description: 本周三，一个臭名昭著的网络犯罪团伙 Scattered Spider 的一名成员因与一系列重大黑客攻击和加密货币盗窃案有关而被判处十年监禁。【原文：A member of a notorious cybercrime gang known as Scattered Spider was sentenced on Wednesday to ten years in prison in connection with a string of major hacks and cryptocurrency thefts.】

item.title: Quantinuum 考虑以 100 亿美元估值筹集资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，霍尼韦尔国际公司和 Quantinuum 的其他支持者正在考虑为这家量子计算公司筹集资金，估值约为 100 亿美元。【原文：Honeywell International Inc. and other backers of Quantinuum are considering raising money for the quantum computing firm at a valuation of around $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 支付受访者、国税局记录及其他改进美国劳工数据的措施
item.description: 用于编制美国重要经济调查的答复率低，这让一些人提出了一个非常规的解决方案：付钱让受访者回答问题。【原文：Poor response rates used to compile vital US economic surveys have some pitching an unconventional solution: paying respondents to answer questions.】

item.title: 央行官员称冰岛房价是利率计划的关键
item.description: 冰岛央行行长阿斯盖尔-容松（Asgeir Jonsson）表示，在官员们考虑延长宽松政策之前，这个大西洋国家的房地产市场需要降温。【原文：Iceland’s central bank chief, Asgeir Jonsson, indicated that the Atlantic nation’s housing market needs to cool before officials would consider extending their easing campaign.】

item.title: 索尼 PlayStation 游戏机在美国涨价 50 美元
item.description: 索尼集团公司宣布，将把其广受欢迎的 PlayStation 5 游戏机在美国的售价从 500 美元提高到 550 美元。【原文：Sony Group Corp. announced it will raise the price of its popular PlayStation 5 console to $550 from $500 in the US.】

item.title: 南加州面临创纪录高温并准备应对野火
item.description: 连日来的热浪席卷美国西部部分地区，预计将加剧野火风险，促使加利福尼亚州预先部署人员，因为创纪录的干燥植被可能成为大火的火种。【原文：A days-long heat wave rolling across parts of the US West is expected to ramp up wildfire risk, prompting California to pre-deploy crews as record-dry vegetation potentially acts as kindling for blazes.】

item.title: 微软限制中国企业提前获取网络安全漏洞通知
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）在调查了一次泄密是否导致了一系列利用其 SharePoint 软件缺陷的黑客攻击后，限制了中国公司获取有关其技术中网络安全漏洞的预先通知的权限。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has curtailed Chinese companies’ access to advance notifications about cybersecurity vulnerabilities in its technology after investigating whether a leak led to a series of hacks exploiting flaws in its SharePoint software.】

item.title: 沃勒称美联储应就支付服务与业界合作
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）呼吁拥抱人工智能和稳定币领域正在发生的 "技术驱动的革命"，将其作为提振美国经济的一种方式，尽管一些批评人士可能会对所有的炒作持怀疑态度。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller called to embrace the “technology-driven revolution” taking place in artificial intelligence and stablecoins as a way to boost the US economy, although some critics may be skeptical of all the hype.】

item.title: 橡树庄园的马克斯称股市暗示泡沫 "初现端倪
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）告诫说，尽管美股回调的临界点尚未到来，但美股 "正处于泡沫的早期"。【原文：US stocks are “in the early days” for a bubble, although the critical point for a correction has yet to come, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks cautioned.】

item.title: 信用评级下调后主题公园运营商默林公司债券下滑
item.description: 默林娱乐有限公司（Merlin Entertainments Ltd）的高级担保债券将创下历史新低，此前 S&P 全球评级公司警告称，这家主题公园运营商可能在一年内出现现金短缺。【原文：Merlin Entertainments Ltd’s senior secured bonds are set for a record drop, after S&P Global Ratings warned that the theme park operator could run low on cash in a year.】

item.title: 英国里夫斯考虑征收家庭住房税以填补迫在眉睫的预算缺口
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）正在考虑对高价值家庭住宅征税，因为她正在想方设法填补即将到来的预算中数十亿英镑的缺口。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is considering taxing high-value family homes as she looks for ways to plug a multibillion-pound hole in the upcoming budget.】

item.title: 比佛利山庄度假村赢得纳税资格，为出售市政债券做准备
item.description: 比佛利山庄（Beverly Hills）的一个超豪华度假村获得了市议会的批准，成立了一个特别征税区，这是通过市政债券市场筹集多达 5.5 亿美元资金的第一步。【原文：An ultra-luxury resort in Beverly Hills won approval from the City Council to form a special taxing district, the first step toward raising as much as $550 million through the municipal bond market.】

item.title: 收益超预期后，努班克一周内第三次获得 "买入 "评级提升
item.description: 周三，巴西 Nu 控股有限公司的股价创下一个月以来的新高，此前花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Shares in Brazil’s Nu Holdings Ltd. hit their highest in a month on Wednesday after Citigroup Inc. became the latest bank to upgrade the fintech following a quarterly earnings beat and a positive outlook on the fintech’s asset quality.】

item.title: 习近平推动巨型水坝和铁路连接促进西藏发展
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁中国推进西藏的重点基础设施项目，如耗资1.2万亿元人民币（约合1,670亿美元）的大型水坝，以促进该地区的发展。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping called on the country to advance key infrastructure projects in Tibet such as its massive 1.2 trillion yuan ($167 billion) mega-dam to spur development in the region.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "美国优先 "关税政策为波多黎各带来意外之喜
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "美国优先 "关税政策正在促进波多黎各的制造业发展，他对这个岛屿的攻击和帮助都超过了其他任何一位美国领导人。【原文：President Donald Trump’s “America First” tariff policies are boosting manufacturing in Puerto Rico, an island he has both attacked and claimed to help more than any other US leader.】

item.title: 摩根大通和 MUFG 将牵头为 Vantage 数据中心提供 220 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group are leading a $22 billion loan to support Vantage Data Centers’ plan to build a massive data-center campus, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 牛肉价格飙升是英国最新的通胀难题
item.description: 牛肉、巧克力和咖啡价格的两位数涨幅让英国人倍感压力，因为恶劣的天气和更高的生产成本有可能加剧最近的生活成本紧缩。【原文：Britons are feeling the pinch from double-digit increases in the price of beef, chocolate and coffee, as bad weather and higher production costs risk worsening a recent cost-of-living squeeze.】

item.title: 国债在 20 年期债券拍卖和美联储会议纪要公布前扩大涨幅
item.description: 美国国债连续第二天上涨，交易员们在等待 20 年期国债拍卖和上月美联储会议纪要，当时有两位决策者持反对意见，支持降低利率。【原文：US Treasuries gained for a second day as traders wait for a 20-year bond auction and the minutes of last month’s Federal Reserve meeting, when two policymakers dissented in favor of reducing interest rates.】

item.title: 麦格理聘请 Equinor 的 Ravelli 担任液化天然气交易全球主管
item.description: 随着超级冷冻燃料市场的蓬勃发展，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）聘请 Samuele Ravelli 领导其全球液化天然气贸易业务。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. has hired Samuele Ravelli to lead its global LNG trading business as the market for the super-chilled fuel booms.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前美股有望延续跌势
item.description: 本周晚些时候将举行备受关注的美联储座谈会，在零售商财报纷至沓来之际，投资者对天价估值提出质疑，股市连续第四天下跌。【原文：Stocks headed for a fourth straight day of declines as investors questioned sky-high valuations amid a deluge of earnings reports from retailers, with a closely watched Federal Reserve symposium to come later this week.】
